mapper.insert: insert into employees (emp_num, emp_id, emp_pw, emp_name, emp_addr, emp_addr_detail, emp_post, emp_phone, emp_jumin, emp_email, emp_hire_date, emp_image) values (#{empNum}, #{empId}, #{empPw}, #{empName}, #{empAddr}, #{empAddrDetail}, #{empPost}, #{empPhone}, #{empJumin}, #{empEmail}, sysdate, null)
